channel.title: Interface help
channel.description: when i leave a place like godwars the kc interface stays with me? same with the wildy skull from wilderness how do i fix thanks:)

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

You WILL need to convert these for your server, but updating would be a good start:

Engine.Frames.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
Engine.Frames.updateRequired = true;

Example of conversion (I’m trying to help users learn not just get spoon-fed).

appearanceUpdateRequired = true; //same for the other one

Read full topic

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @Fatal-pkers Fatal-pkers
item.description:
@Fatal-pkers wrote:

i have nothing to base it off of because all of my interfaces do this so idk where to start

Read full topic

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Find the methods to remove it. Try looking under similar interfaces such as Pest Control if you have them. You just need to update it, you essentially need to “flush” it out, EXCEPT it isn’t a real flush in Java terms. I’m just trying to put it so you can understand it.

Read full topic
